column2: Amplify Energy Corp. is an independent oil and natural gas company, which engages in acquisition, development, exploration and production of oil and natural gas properties. The company is headquartered in Houston, Texas and currently employs 85 full-time employees. The firm is engaged in the acquisition, development, exploration and production of oil and natural gas properties. Its operations are focused in the Rockies, offshore California, Oklahoma, East Texas / North Louisiana and South Texas. The company has approximately 917 billions of cubic feet equivalent (bcfe) estimated proved reserves.
